module.name: Daily Life
module.description: Learn vocabulary for family, food, everyday objects, and time expressions.

lessons.title: Family and Daily Words
lessons.description: Learn essential vocabulary for family members, common foods, and household items.

quiz_questions.question: How do you say 'mother' casually in Chinese?
quiz_questions.explanation: '妈妈' (māma) is casual. '母亲' (mǔqīn) is formal.

quiz_questions.question: What does '哥哥' (gēge) mean?
quiz_questions.explanation: '哥哥' means older brother. '弟弟' (dìdi) is younger brother.

quiz_questions.question: How do you say 'water' in Chinese?
quiz_questions.explanation: '水' (shuǐ) means water.

quiz_questions.question: What is '面包' in English?
quiz_questions.explanation: '面包' (miànbāo) means bread.

quiz_questions.question: How do you say 'house' in Chinese?
quiz_questions.explanation: '房子' (fángzi) means house. '家' (jiā) means home/family.

lessons.title: Possession and Existence
lessons.description: Learn possessive 的, 有 (to have/exist), and measure words.

quiz_questions.question: How do you say 'my mother' in Chinese?
quiz_questions.explanation: '我的妈妈' - possessor + 的 + possessed.

quiz_questions.question: '我有两个哥哥' means:
quiz_questions.explanation: '有' means to have. '两个哥哥' = two older brothers.

quiz_questions.question: Which form is used for 'don't have'?
quiz_questions.explanation: '没有' (méiyǒu) means 'don't have' or 'there is no'.

quiz_questions.question: Complete: '我__一个姐姐' (I have one older sister)
quiz_questions.explanation: '我有一个姐姐' - use 有 for possession.

quiz_questions.question: What is the measure word for family members (counting)?
quiz_questions.explanation: '口' (kǒu) is used for family members. '我家有四口人'.

quiz_questions.question: How do you say 'There are 5 people in my family'?
quiz_questions.explanation: '我家有五口人' - place + 有 + number + measure word + noun.

quiz_questions.question: '这是我的家' means:
quiz_questions.explanation: '这是' (this is) + '我的家' (my home).

quiz_questions.question: The particle '的' is used for:
quiz_questions.explanation: '的' shows possession and modifies nouns: 我的书 (my book).

lessons.title: Family Conversations
lessons.description: Practice talking about your family and daily routines.

flashcards.back: 你有兄弟姐妹吗? (Nǐ yǒu xiōngdì jiěmèi ma?)
我有两个哥哥 (Wǒ yǒu liǎng gè gēge)

quiz_questions.question: How do you ask 'Do you have siblings?' in Chinese?
quiz_questions.explanation: '你有...吗?' is the pattern for asking if someone has something.

quiz_questions.question: How do you say 'I live with my family'?
quiz_questions.explanation: '我和家人住在一起' - 和 = with, 住 = live, 在一起 = together.

quiz_questions.question: What does '现在几点?' mean?
quiz_questions.explanation: '现在几点?' asks for the current time.

quiz_questions.question: How do you say 'It's 3 o'clock'?
quiz_questions.explanation: '三点' (sān diǎn) = 3 o'clock. '点' means o'clock/dot.

quiz_questions.question: How do you respond to '你家有几口人?'
quiz_questions.explanation: '五口人' - answer with number + measure word + people.

lessons.title: Reading About Daily Life
lessons.description: Read and understand texts about family and daily routines.

quiz_questions.question: Read: '我的家庭很大。我有三个哥哥。' How many older brothers?
quiz_questions.explanation: '三个哥哥' means three older brothers.

quiz_questions.question: Read: '我早上八点吃早饭。' When does the person eat breakfast?
quiz_questions.explanation: '八点' means 8 o'clock.

quiz_questions.question: Read: '妈妈每天做饭。' What does the mother do?
quiz_questions.explanation: '做饭' means 'to cook'. 做 = make, 饭 = rice/meal.

quiz_questions.question: Read: '我们的房子小，但是很舒服。' The house is:
quiz_questions.explanation: '小但是舒服' = small but comfortable.

quiz_questions.question: Read: '星期天我们和爷爷奶奶吃午饭。' When do they eat lunch with grandparents?
quiz_questions.explanation: '星期天' means Sunday.

lessons.title: Days and Time Expressions
lessons.description: Learn to understand days of the week and time expressions.

quiz_questions.question: Which day sounds like 'SHING-chee EE'?
quiz_questions.explanation: '星期一' (Xīngqī yī - Monday) = 'week one'.

quiz_questions.question: How do you say 'Saturday' in Chinese?
quiz_questions.explanation: '星期六' = Saturday. '星期天/日' = Sunday.

quiz_questions.question: Chinese days are:
quiz_questions.explanation: Chinese days are 星期 + numbers 1-6, Sunday is 星期天 or 星期日.

quiz_questions.question: What does '周末' mean?
quiz_questions.explanation: '周末' (zhōumò) = week + end = weekend.

quiz_questions.question: Which day sounds like 'SHING-chee SAN'?
quiz_questions.explanation: '星期三' (Xīngqī sān - Wednesday) = 'week three'.
